package Assignment;

import java.util.HashSet;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Program11 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		HashSet<String> color=new HashSet();
		
		colors.add("Pink");
		colors.add("Blue");
		colors.add("Peach");
		colors.add("Black");
		colors.add("White");
		
		System.out.println("HashSet Contains : "+colors);
		
		int n=colors.size();
		String arr[]=new String[n];
		
		int i=0;
		for(String ele:colors)
		{
			arr[i++]=ele;
		}
		
		System.out.println("Array Contains : ");
		for(String ele:arr)
		{
			System.out.println(ele);
		}
		
		//OR
		
		colors.toArray(arr);
		System.out.println("\nArray Contains(Using ToArray()) Method : ");
		for(String ele:arr)
		{
			System.out.println(ele);
		}

	}

}
